bike.description: 6061 aluminum tubes with gusseted down tube and asymmetrical chainstays, fully-active/mp2 suspension with 90mm rear travel, Rock Shox Bar R air shock with rebound damping, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Rock Shox XC30 TK, Coil spring, external rebound, TurnKey lockout, 30mm stanchions, 100mm travel
FSA ZS-4D Zero-Stack internal cup, threadless, 25mm shim stack, 1 1/8"
Alex TD25 double-wall disc-specific rims with reinforced spoke bed rims, 32H, Formula alloy 6-bolt disc hubs, 14g black stainless steel spokes
Shimano Alivio M410 rear and Shimano M311 31.8mm dual pull front
Tektro HDC-300 Hydraulic disc brakes w/160mm rotors
Jamis XC alloy riser, 31.8 x 8JAMIS_DEGREE x 25mm rise x 680mm
Jamis XC alloy threadless, 7JAMIS_DEGREE rise x 90mm (13/15/17"), 100mm (19/21"), 110mm (23")
Jamis OS alloy micro-adjust, 31.6 x 350mm, with alloy QR clamp
Jamis ATB Comp with pressure relief channel
